attributes.action: Give all students the same amount of university grant irrespective of income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My 18 year old son (who I am not legally responsible for)is starting university in September 2007, due to my salary he is entitled to no grant. Why should he have more debt because I am employed?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
